oopGUIDatabase module¶

class oopGUIDatabase.MainWindow[source]¶

Bases: QWidget

Main application window for the University Management System.

This class handles the creation of the GUI, including setting up tabs and widgets for managing students, instructors, courses, and assignments.

create_students_tab()[source]¶

Creates and returns the Students tab for the main window.

Returns:

The Students tab with layout and widgets configured.

Return type:

QWidget

oopGUIDatabase.assign_instructor_to_course(course_id, instructor_id)[source]¶

Assign an instructor to a specific course.

Parameters:

  • course_id (int) – The ID of the course.

  • instructor_id (int) – The ID of the instructor.

oopGUIDatabase.assign_student_to_course(course_id, student_id)[source]¶

Assign a student to a specific course.

Parameters:

  • course_id (int) – The ID of the course.

  • student_id (int) – The ID of the student.

oopGUIDatabase.execute_query(query, params=(), fetchone=False, fetchall=False)[source]¶

Execute a SQL query on the database.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – SQL query to be executed.

  • params (tuple, optional) – Parameters to bind to the SQL query.

  • fetchone (bool, optional) – Fetch only the first row of the result.

  • fetchall (bool, optional) – Fetch all rows of the result.

Returns:

The result of the query, depending on fetchone or fetchall.

Return type:

tuple or list of tuples

oopGUIDatabase.fetch_courses()[source]¶

Fetch all courses along with their assigned instructors from the database.

Returns:

List containing course records with instructor details.

Return type:

list of tuple

oopGUIDatabase.fetch_instructors()[source]¶

Fetch all instructor records from the database.

Returns:

List containing all instructor records.

Return type:

list of tuple

oopGUIDatabase.fetch_students()[source]¶

Fetch all student records from the database.

Returns:

List containing all student records.

Return type:

list of tuple

oopGUIDatabase.insert_course(title, code, instructor_id)[source]¶

Insert a new course into the database.

Parameters:

  • title (str) – The title of the course.

  • code (str) – The code of the course.

  • instructor_id (int) – The ID of the instructor assigned to the course.

oopGUIDatabase.insert_instructor(name, department)[source]¶

Insert a new instructor into the database.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the instructor.

  • department (str) – The department of the instructor.

oopGUIDatabase.insert_student(name, age, email)[source]¶

Insert a new student into the database.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the student.

  • age (int) – The age of the student.

  • email (str) – The email address of the student.
